Name: Training
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models><model id="DummyModel" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="Product_Request__c"><fields/><conditions><condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state=""/></conditions><actions/></model></models><components><panelset type="custom" scroll="" cssclass="certification"><panels><panel width="50%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>Critical to being a successful Informatica partner is a thorough understanding of our product portfolio. INFORM Partners have available to them a comprehensive set of sales and technical courseware that will enable them to effectively promote, sell, and deploy Informatica solutions. In addition to product courseware, we offer partners sales and technical sales training and certification on our leading technologies.</p>
<p>INFORM Partners are required to achieve certification on one or more of our products on an annual basis. Please refer to the INFORM Program Guide for specifics on the certification requirements.</p>
<p>To take advantage of the exponential market growth expected in areas such as Analytics, Total Customer Relationship, Application Consolidation, Cloud Modernization and Data Governance, Partners must have trained and competent employees who can position and promote Informatica’s solutions.</p></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="50%"><components><template multiple="false" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="callout-box">
	<h2>NEW PARTNER CERTIFICATION PACKAGES!</h2><br/>
<p>Informatica now offers all INFORM Partners aggressively priced certification packages through the Certify Now initiative.</p>
	<a class="btn" href="Partner_Certification">LEARN MORE</a>
</div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset><panelset type="custom" scroll="" cssclass="training-resource"><panels><panel width="100%"><components><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="false" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong><a href="Sales_Training">SALES</a></strong></br></br><p>Sales  identifies and generates revenue opportunities and is the primary interface between your company and Informatica customers.  Sales articulates the value proposition of  Informatica products and solutions. Sales:</p>
<ul><li>Develops joint solution offerings and go to market strategies</li>
<li>Articulates customers’ business model, identifying all key players</li>
<li>Ensures customer readiness</li></ul></br></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true" cssclass=""><contents><strong><a href="Presales_Training">TECHNICAL SALES</a></strong></br></br>
<p>Presales is a technical and collaborative role that works with other members of the presales team to address the technical needs of potential customers and to close new business deals from sales leads.  As the subject matter expert, Presales will:</p><ul><li>Translate clients’ business challenges and concerns into a solution oriented discussion.</li>
<li>Counsel customers on the capabilities of our products and solutions.</li>
<li>Provide advice and guidance to coworkers.</li>
<li>Train your team.</li>
<li>Influence and effect business outcomes.</li></ul></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true" cssclass=""><contents><strong><a href="Product_Training">IMPLEMENTATION</a></strong></br></br>
<p>Implementation provides a systematic and structured approach to effectively integrate Informatica’s technologies and solutions.  This role is critical to the post-sale processes ensuring the solution is operating properly in its environment, including analyzing requirements, installation, configuration, customization, systems integration, and support.</p>

</contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url="">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a{
    font-size: 12pt;    
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #FFD400;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #2A58B8;
}

.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:first-child{
    border-top-left-radius: 3px;
    border-top-right-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:last-child{
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
.new-registration.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:nth-last-child(2){
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    color: white;
    font-size: 16pt;
}
.nx-page .callout-box .btn{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}
.nx-page .callout-box ul{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.nx-template{
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin: 10px;
}

/* General html */
.nx-page h1, .nx-page h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    color: #939598;
}

.nx-template .btn{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 13pt;
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 21px;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
}
.nx-template{
    color: #6d6f71;
    font-size: 13pt;
    line-height: 18pt;
}
.nx-template li{
    font-size: 13pt;
}
.nx-template a{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #4E7DBF;
}

.nx-template a:hover{
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* vidyard override */
.vidyard_tmask{
    position: fixed !important;
}

.vidyard_play_button a:hover {
  background-position: 0px 0px;
}
.vidyard_play_button a {
  position: absolute;
  margin: -42px 0 0 -26px;
  border-radius: 0px;
  background-position: 0px 0px;
  height: 85px;
  width: 72px;
  background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
}</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="page-specific" cachelocation="false">.training-resource{
    padding-top: 20px;
    position: relative;
    min-height: 100px;
}
.training-resource:first-child{
    min-height: 275px;
}
.start-campaign{
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 10px;
}
.training-resource-title .nx-template{
    font-size: 14pt;
    color: #555;
    font-weight: bold;
}</cssitem></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Training/Focus-Areas/Presales
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>TECHNICAL SALES TRAINING</h2></contents></template><tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas=""><tabs><tab name="Training Courses"><components><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="60%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>Informatica strongly recommends that all Partner technical sales employees have the practical knowledge to sell Informatica solutions.  We have created courseware that will improve your ability to identify, qualify, and close on sales opportunities.
</p><p>Partner technical sales personnel can quickly achieve competency on one or more Informatica technologies. Our courseware is a tiered process beginning with Bronze (currently designated as Accreditation) followed by Silver training. Below lists our current training.  Informatica will periodically update this website with future releases.</p></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong>Bronze</strong>
<ul>
<li>Big Data</li>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=43f7d0f6-c82b-4dfd-9075-807144c90206" target="_blank">Partner Presales Bronze Accreditation - Ultra Messaging (UM) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f7a41b76-729f-4af7-9670-9f06b9b944a0" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Big Data Edition Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li></ul>
<li>Cloud</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=3d6c1336-c31d-4685-8089-2c7506c086c2" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Cloud Data Management (CDM)/Hybrid IT Curriculum</a></li></ul>
 <li>Data Integration</li>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=36381500-8ae9-4157-a6df-8859490fbfc5" target="_blank">Partner Presales Bronze Accreditation - B2B Data Exchange (B2B DX) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=aa421bb2-e253-4f8c-8c13-c0c0c7cdf11c" target="_blank">Partner Presales Bronze Accreditation - B2B Data Transformation (B2B DT) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=59f94b81-999f-4313-a191-835dbcd9a5f9" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - PowerCenter Real Time Package</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=0124b359-0e0e-4a34-988b-d1e3afac9c0a" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Integration Hub (DIH) Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=8bf62431-1261-4b9d-9a58-ca5cf57fa357" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Integration (DI) Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li></ul>
<li>Data Quality</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=e32101a1-b71f-4dcc-a424-3a46d44fcb1f" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Quality (DQ) Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=6f8fecde-9d46-4059-8a66-4a032709d9d0" target=“_blank”>Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Archive (DA) Curriculum</a></li>
<li>
<a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=fdcb6082-0f17-40b9-b5fe-2f3665c9e9f"  target=“_blank”>
Partner Presales Bronze Accreditation - ILM Test Data Management (ILM TDM) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=2198be24-b491-461e-bf59-19b8427ff1f0" target=“_blank”>Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data as a Service (DaaS) Curriculum</a></li>
</ul>
<li>Master Data Management (MDM)</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=e83aee66-d0f3-48b4-86dd-988f12ef30b7" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Master Data Management (MDM) Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=eef16817-4fe0-4e53-bfc9-215581c45e3f" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Product Information Management (PIM) Curriculum (Partner Presales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f314d73b-b69e-4864-9999-b362e0f8f265" target="_blank">PIM: New User Extended (onDemand)</a></li></ul></ul></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong>Silver</strong>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=b0ba9c9b-9a66-4a49-aef7-104cbdf3eaa4" target="_blank">Position and Present (Silver) – Data Integration Hub (Partner Presales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=a2ff5370-c4f4-4866-a8b4-6fb0d7f4b9e2" target="_blank">Partner Presales Silver Accreditation - Data Quality (DQ) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=aa1c15b7-24e7-42d1-b86b-6684d4af4b86" target="_blank">Partner Presales Silver Accreditation - MDM Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=c867d251-9101-471a-a7e7-dc7d2d172904" target="_blank">Partner Presales Silver Accreditation - Data Replication (IDR) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=b257d574-1fbd-44b3-afe1-1f369678f8b6" target="_blank">Partner Presales Silver Accreditation - Data Services (IDS) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=e9284d90-94a3-462e-ad59-6419aa98ef2a" target="_blank">Partner Presales Silver Accreditation - PowerCenter (PC) Curriculum</a></li>
</ul>
</contents></template></components></panel><panel width="40%"><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" >
<p><strong>New Features Courses
</strong></br></br>New 60-minute eLearning modules provide an overview of major features and functions that have been modified and/or added across multiple Informatica technologies.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=b09445ca-5a16-4e83-aaa8-328e6fa0c234" target="_blank">Big Data Management 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=68eab6ae-7faf-4e05-8bbd-04481450cc65" target="_blank">Business Glossary 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=5669dd27-5f6c-4d1d-b437-0323dfff42df" target="_blank">Data Quality 10: Administration, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=5efd464a-da49-4d0f-96b9-245f1998ebbd" target="_blank">Data Quality 10: Developer/Analyst, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=8141c068-dd4f-4d08-8e9c-6110b91a4bf6" target="_blank">Master Data Management (MDM) 10.1: Multidomain Edition, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=0510ebbc-b6ef-4c6a-9dda-9497f2a1213a" target="_blank">Master Data Management (MDM) 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=6da9c8f7-8812-4ad0-81a6-e545c183c141" target="_blank">Metadata Manager 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=c87ad544-46a0-4c3c-b58a-00df9ff70845" target="_blank">PowerCenter 10: New Features</a></li>
</ul>
</div></div></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" >
<p><strong>Other Learning Assets
</strong>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/10477/197975/deep-dive-on-informatica-powercenter-data-quality-data-integration-hub-10-1" target="_blank">Deep Dive on Informatica PowerCenter, Data Quality, & Data Integration Hub 10.1</a></li>
<li><a href="http://mandrillapp.com/track/click/30205590/www.brighttalk.com?" target="_blank">Data Integration Productivity Advancements in v10.1 - Technical Deep Dive</a></li>
</ul>
</div></div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components></tab><tab name="Straight Scoops" loadlazypanels="true"><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents></br><h3>Straight Scoop Recordings</h3></br>
<strong>NEW PowerCenter, DQ, DIH v10.1: Features, Functions, Capabilities-PreSales Technical Briefing</strong></br><em>May 19, 2016</em></br>Straight Scoop Objectives - Learn how the new and improved 10.1 will:</br><ul><li>Deliver productivity enhancements that allow developers to dramatically increase code re-use, accelerating business value delivery</li>
<li>Significantly improve the productivity of data quality professionals with improved data visualizations to enable them to more, faster</li>
<li>Dramatically simplify overall data integration architectures with further DIH enhancements, enabling IT to deliver business self-service and “do more with less”</li></ul><ul><a href="https://informatica-enablement.webex.com/ec0701lsp13/eventcenter/recording/recordAction.do?theAction=poprecord&AT=pb&internalRecordTicket=4832534b00000002b9e49230fb98edc8d3e478745cb60154c07229e5bd0141b4186078cc95b3c2ee&renewticket=0&isurlact=true&recordID=51411662&apiname=lsr.php&format=short&needFilter=false&&SP=EC&rID=51411662&RCID=9e06cbed271e461488b6617a2939f5ed&siteurl=informatica-enablement&actappname=ec0701lsp13&actname=%2Feventcenter%2Fframe%2Fg.do&rnd=4695521167&entappname=url0201lsp13&entactname=%2FnbrRecordingURL.do" target="_blank">View Recording</a></ul></br>
<strong>PowerCenter, DQ, DIH v10.1: Features, Functions, Capabilities
-Presales Technical Briefing</strong></br><em>May 5, 2016</em>
</br>
Straight Scoop Objectives:
<ul><li>Learn what’s new in v10.1 and WHY a customer should care about what’s new</li>
<li>How to take advantage of the new capabilities in v10.1 to grab your customer’s attention</li>
<li>What account based marketing programs you can leverage to introduce yourself or re-acquaint yourself with your customer</li></ul><ul>
<a href="https://informatica-enablement.webex.com/informatica-enablement/lsr.php?RCID=d66a7f810492469c85749e52f7e246d5" target="_blank">View Recording</a></br></ul></br>

<strong>Big Data Management v10.1: Presales Technical Briefing for Partners</strong>
</br><em>March 23, 2016</em>
</br>
Straight Scoop Objectives:
<ul><li>Understand how to position Informatica Big Data Management for new workloads and new buyer personas</li>
<li>Advise buyers as to differentiated capabilities from Informatica they’ll need to fulfill their business and technical requirements</li>
<li>Understand presales enablement and product launch timelines</li></ul></br><ul>
<a href="https://informatica-enablement.webex.com/informatica-enablement/lsr.php?RCID=d66a7f810492469c85749e52f7e246d5" target="_blank">View Recording</a></br>
<a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000002G2H2IAK" target="_blank">Download BDM v10.1 Pre-Sales Technical Briefing</a></ul></contents></template></components></tab></tabs></tabset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Training/Focus-Areas/Product
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>IMPLEMENTATION TRAINING</h2></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>Informatica’s Professional Services (IPS) offers  training with focus on how to effectively implement Master Data Management (MDM), Data Quality (DQ), and MDM Product360.    These boot camps are instructor-led trainings with a mix of lectures and  hands on labs, providing an opportunity to apply product knowledge within an intensive simulated customer implementation.  These are the same boot camps that IPS uses to train the IPS practice.   Product knowledge is a prerequisite to be successful in this session.   </p> </contents></template><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><strong>Announcing NEW Professional Services Offerings - Click the links below to learn more.</strong>

<li><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/
068G0000001mNQUIA2">Partner Installs</a> – Exclusive for partners, IPS will deliver software installs for partners. </li></div></div></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p><table style="background-color: #999; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 1pt;" width="100%" cellpadding="6">

Name: Training/Focus-Areas/Sales
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>SALES TRAINING</h2></contents></template><tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas=""><tabs><tab name="Training Courses"><components><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="60%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p> Informatica strongly recommends that all partner presales and sales employees have the practical knowledge to sell Informatica solutions. We have created courseware that will improve your ability to identify, qualify, and close on sales opportunities.</p>
<p>Partner sales personnel can quickly achieve competency on one or more Informatica technologies.</p>
<p>The entire set of courseware is provided at no charge to INFORM Partners</p>
</contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong>Bronze</strong>

<ul>
<li>Big Data</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f643420f-c204-4acf-bb8e-6215aad35300" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Big Data Edition Curriculum (Sales)</a></li></ul>
<li>Cloud</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=3d6c1336-c31d-4685-8089-2c7506c086c2" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Cloud Data Management (CDM)/Hybrid IT Curriculum</a></li></ul>
<li>Data Integration</li>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=59f94b81-999f-4313-a191-835dbcd9a5f9" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - PowerCenter Real Time Package</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f06d7c35-fa20-4a91-8fa7-afb273ad6912" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Intelligent Data Platform</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=1bfc09cd-3c4d-4232-9cd3-b53b98908016" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Integration (DI) Curriculum (Sales)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f3e41f6d-a2e5-470a-9c07-d1119d99a3f9" target=“_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Integration Hub (DIH) Curriculum (Sales)</a> </li></ul>

<li>Data Quality</li>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=2198be24-b491-461e-bf59-19b8427ff1f0" target="_blank">Identify and Quality (Bronze) - Data as a Service (DaaS) Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=728eb9a4-8a04-43f2-81c5-f5e92470c08a" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Quality (DQ) Curriculum (Sales)</a></li>
 </ul>


<li>Master Data Management (MDM)</li>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=fd766e08-ab80-4b4f-86ae-ffcb0c264420" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Master Data Management (MDM) Curriculum (Sales)</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=4e4a5d9f-4dc9-4339-ace9-2f7304258f06" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Product Information Management (PIM) Curriculum (Sales)</a></li></ul>
<li>Data Security</li>
<ul><li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=5f0333d5-fb6a-45d7-8023-e0530acd5da7" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Secure@Source Curriculum</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=6f8fecde-9d46-4059-8a66-4a032709d9d0" target="_blank">Identify and Qualify (Bronze) - Data Archive (DA) Curriculum</a></li></ul>
</ul>


</contents></template></components></panel><panel width="40%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" >
<p><strong>New Features Courses
</strong></br></br>New 60-minute eLearning modules provide an overview of major features and functions that have been modified and/or added across multiple Informatica technologies.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=b09445ca-5a16-4e83-aaa8-328e6fa0c234" target="_blank">Big Data Management 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=68eab6ae-7faf-4e05-8bbd-04481450cc65" target="_blank">Business Glossary 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=5669dd27-5f6c-4d1d-b437-0323dfff42df" target="_blank">Data Quality 10: Administration, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=5efd464a-da49-4d0f-96b9-245f1998ebbd" target="_blank">Data Quality 10: Developer/Analyst, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=8141c068-dd4f-4d08-8e9c-6110b91a4bf6" target="_blank">Master Data Management (MDM) 10.1: Multidomain Edition, New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=0510ebbc-b6ef-4c6a-9dda-9497f2a1213a" target="_blank">Master Data Management (MDM) 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=6da9c8f7-8812-4ad0-81a6-e545c183c141" target="_blank">Metadata Manager 10: New Features</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=c87ad544-46a0-4c3c-b58a-00df9ff70845" target="_blank">PowerCenter 10: New Features</a></li>
</ul>
</div></div></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" >
<p><strong>Know the Play!</strong></br></br>Sales Plays define key business imperatives that companies are investing in today, and help better serve those data driven businesses.   These 30-minute modules are designed to provide Partners with information on the opportunity, customer profile, personas, use cases, and the technology best suited to meet customers’ needs.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=65331a65-2ea5-4ee2-ac4f-0aa5b0c20adc" target="_blank">Analytics</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=f76a5710-528a-4882-b7c8-8f22f631cd97
" target="_blank">Total Customer Relationship</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=8ada9873-9afe-4064-8344-3c1be0a2110d" target="_blank">Application Consolidation</a></li>
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=b2217330-64ed-42b4-b0c3-6f2fe79ec2b6" target="_blank">Data Governance</a></li> 
<li><a href="https://informatica.csod.com/DeepLink/ProcessRedirect.aspx?module=lodetails&lo=83155265-eced-4183-b599-d564edb25f3f" target="_blank">Cloud Modernization</a></li></ul>
</div></div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components></tab><tab name="Straight Scoops" loadlazypanels="true"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents></br><h3>Straight Scoop Recordings</h3></br>
<strong>NEW PowerCenter, DQ, DIH v10.1: Up-sell, cross-sell, build pipeline, accelerate deals-Sales Briefing</strong></br><em>May 18, 2016</em><br>Straight Scoop Objectives:</br><ul><li>Learn what’s new in v10.1 and WHY a customer should care about what’s new</li>
<li>How to take advantage of the new capabilities in v10.1 to grab your customer’s attention</li>
<li>What account based marketing programs you can leverage to introduce yourself or re-acquaint yourself with your customer</li></ul>
<ul><a href="https://informatica-enablement.webex.com/ec0701lsp13/eventcenter/recording/recordAction.do?theAction=poprecord&AT=pb&internalRecordTicket=4832534b000000028599f31a502f9ff311481e182b4b3a3f6c060532e1ac1bf24c865de6eb20d5f2&renewticket=0&isurlact=true&recordID=51352447&apiname=lsr.php&format=short&needFilter=false&&SP=EC&rID=51352447&RCID=7ceca88009564fb185c4aecac1b329a5&siteurl=informatica-enablement&actappname=ec0701lsp13&actname=%2Feventcenter%2Fframe%2Fg.do&rnd=5960555625&entappname=url0201lsp13&entactname=%2FnbrRecordingURL.do" target="_blank">View Recording</a></ul></br>
<strong>Big Data Management v10.1: Sales Briefing for Partners</strong></br><em>March 21, 2016</em>
</br>
Straight Scoop Objectives:
<ul><li>Understand how to position Informatica Big Data Management for new workloads and new buyer personas</li><li>Advise buyers as to which products they’ll need to fulfill their business and technical requirements</li>
<li>Understand sales enablement and product launch timelines</li></ul><ul>
<a href="https://informatica-enablement.webex.com/informatica-enablement/lsr.php?RCID=f81d2766bd714fc4911d5b3021d8b799" target="_blank">View Recording</a></br></contents></template></components></tab></tabs></tabset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Training/Focus-Areas/Support
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>SUPPORT TRAINING</h2>
<p>Informatica Global Customer Support provides customers with world class technical support to ensure successful implementation of their business solutions by using Informatica products. For ten consecutive years, Informatica Global Customer Support received top marks in Customer Loyalty.</p> 
<p>Partners that provide first tier support to our customers are required to complete the relevant product Support enablement. </p>
<p>The Support Enablement documents provide troubleshooting tips, useful support tools, a list of key tasks to complete before opening a Support Case and links to the relevant product documentation and How To Libraries (H2L). </p><p>
